input_args.text: '“ Justifying the Saudi Slaughter in Yemen ” by Gareth Porter, Oct. 31, 2016 \nTo produce and publish these stories – and many more – costs money. And except for some book sales, we depend on the generous support of our readers. \nSo, please consider a tax-deductible donation either by credit card online or by mailing a check . (For readers wanting to use PayPal, you can address contributions to our PayPal Giving Fund account, which is named “The Consortium for Independent Journalism”).'
